title: Poking the Bear (feat. Tony Roberts)
description:
Tony Roberts joins The Bonfire and weighs in on the topic of T.I. starting a stand-up career.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
